alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 10:27PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON AND SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM CST... At 1026 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a waterspout over marine areas over Bay St. Louis, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Shoreline Park, and Kiln. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 24. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
